module.name: XMPP
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php. Manage and configure a XMPP Server Prosody and requires the Prosody RPM from FreePBX be installed.
module.changelog: *2.11.1.16* Display settings on user creation *2.11.1.15* Add one-to-many mappings for extensions on userman users. *2.11.1.14* Require rebuild of configs on module upgrade *2.11.1.13* Fix for upcoming userman module update *2.11.1.12* Handle AMI reconnect, fixing a resource consumption issue. *2.11.1.11* Fix rare usermanager preload error bug *2.11.1.8* Sales cleanup *2.11.1.7* Hide xmpp setting on user creation *2.11.1.6* Set dirty to true when deleting users *2.11.1.5* Change Username Fix *2.11.1.4* Instead of using internal functions just remove the user through SQL *2.11.1.3* UM Tweak *2.11.1.2* UM Tweak *2.11.1.1* UM Tweak *2.11.1.0* Now using User Manager *2.11.0.7* Add presence component, for managing presence state. *2.11.0.4* Add Assets Back *2.11.0.3* Fix issue with not updating MySQL password. *2.11.0.2* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.2 *2.11.0.1* Fix issue with sales page not showing *2.11.0.0* Bump for 2.11 *2.10.5.11* Add sales information *2.10.5.10* Generate password if non given on migration
